It is said that “Education can Change the World”. What according to you are the key contributions of Education in Modern Society?

Education is considered pivotal in anyone's life. Education gives scope for further improvement. To provide proper education to their children is every parents primary concern. For any child, education is considered as their first priority. If the people of a nation are not properly educated, there will be no development.

In today's modern society without proper education a person is considered semi-literate. One has to be properly and completely educated. In today's era there is no end to learning, one has to be a prepared to learn on and on and be a student in his/her life. With cut-throath competition, there is a strive to educate and update oneself from time to time. There is no end to education and learning is an ongoing process. Earlier there used to be a saturation point for education. But, now-a-days there is no saturation point for education. As per the tastes and wants of people various new subjects came into existence and to study these subjects have become the intrest of people. Depending upon the changing trends, the importance of the subjects have changed, and further sub divisions of those subjects have been considered. 

 Being educated one can enhance their lifestyle. Without knowing what is what and how things can be simplified and have further knowledge one cannot improve and be modern. Education has contributed a lot in the modern society. People being educated have substantially learnt the importance of  preserving nature, natural resources and save them. In a modern society people care for the well being of others and also conserve natural resources. Being educated makes them understand what is good and what is bad and gives a indepth knowledge of what is what. For example, one is seen more campaigns to save mother earth and save animals in cities rather than in rural areas. Not to consider that most of the industries are in urban areas. But also some of the industries are also there in rural areas. Awareness campaigns are seen in urban areas and mostly participated by educated people rather than uneducation people.

 With the help of education, man has taken the road to modernization. There has been updation of everything in one's life. With education only one is living a modern life. One can clearly say that education has changed the world a lot.
